code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';const ProductAPI={getAPI:()=>{const url='/products';return axiosClient.get(url);},getCategory:query=>{const url="/products/category".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},getDetail:id=>{const url="/products/".concat(id);return axiosClient.get(url);},getPagination:query=>{const url="/products/pagination".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default ProductAPI;
